dialogs: ID
dialog
Welcome. What do you need?
How can I help you, commoner?
The King's time is precious. Make it fast.
Your King welcomes you.
The mines are a unforgining type. Watcha need?
There's a caravan trader that passes by a forest camp. They often have goods from other lands.
Come back when I know ya better.
There's a trader from a mine in the mountains. They sell quality ores.
Do you know the Noble Merchant? He has high quality goods for sale.
I really don't know you that well.
Sell me a steel sword, and I will recommend your work to the Knight's Guild.
Talk to the Knight's Guild Quartermaster at the castle.
Our arms are old and unrepairable.
We can complete our quests now because of you. We offer our many thanks.
The King's Consort has requested your service, a reward is offered.
The King's treasury needs more precious materials.
This supplement has ensured the stability of the King's rule. You have suerved your King well.
Help the King's treasurer, The kingdom is relying on you.
The King thanks you for your service. Your reward is given.
The King has requested your presence. Please do not tarry long.
My soldiers stationed at the fort by the mountain could use your help.
